title: My Suunto 9 watch can no longer pair with my Pixel 4. It was working fine and then one day it wasn't
content: I have tried uninstalling the Suunto app, having the pixel 4 forget the bluetooth connection, restarting the phone, reinstalling the app. I have also tried resetting connection settings on my pixel 4. The watch says it's connected but the phone says "connection failed". No data is transferring.
